name: Aldrin Justice
writer: Carter Bays (created by), Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (created by), Craig Thomas (creator), Jamie Rhonheimer, Gloria Calderon Kellett (executive story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: Ted gets Lily a job at his firm, but she only makes trouble for Ted when he refuses to stand up to his boss. And Barney sleeps with Marshall's law school professor to help his grades, but she's less than impressed with his prowess.
